text: Fouad A. Ajami (; September 18, 1945 - June 22, 2014) was an Lebanese-born American professor and writer. He was a senior fellow at Stanford University's Hoover Institution. He was born in Arnoun, Lebanon. Ajami was an outspoken supporter of the Iraq War., p. xii He has also appeared on CNN multiple times. Ajami died from prostate cancer in Maine, aged 68. ==References== ==Other websites== *Fouad Ajami at Johns Hopkins SAIS *Association for the Study of the Middle East and Africa (ASMEA) * Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Stanford University faculty Category:American political writers Category:Writers from Oregon
title: Fouad Ajami
